Berend de Boer wrote:

>     Vincent> On Wednesday, Apr 30, 2003, at 20:41 Europe/Dublin,
>     Vincent> Berend de Boer
>     Vincent> wrote:
>     >> SOAP is quite useful for asynchronous processing for example.
> 
>     Vincent> .. as is SMTP.
> 
> Real message queueing adds a lot more goodies.

Berend,

I'm not sure what your point is. What has message queueing got to do 
with SOAP/SMTP?
